HeroSection.title: Crater - Cloud-Native AI Platform
HeroSection.descriptionLine1: A one-stop solution for machine learning based on Kubernetes.
HeroSection.descriptionLine2: Efficient experience in AI training and serving.

platform.title: Out-of-the-Box Deep Learning Platform
platform.description: Provides an intuitive, easy-to-use interface, eliminating the need to master containers or Kubernetes and lowering the barrier to entry.

openSource.title: Open-Source Enhanced, No Vendor Lock-In
openSource.description: Deeply integrated with open-source projects like Volcano, Fluid, and Envd, ensuring compatibility with the K8s ecosystem and technological autonomy.

costOptimization.title: Intelligent GPU Sharing for Cost Optimization
costOptimization.description: Increases GPU resource utilization by 12% through an interference-aware intelligent sharing strategy, without impacting the user's experience.

CoreCapabilities.title: Core Capabilities
CoreCapabilities.description: Crater provides comprehensive machine learning platform capabilities, from data management to model training, to solve your AI workflow needs in one stop.

dataManagement.title: Data Management
features: Distributed caching system accelerated by Fluid

environmentSetup.title: Environment Setup
features: Envd environment templates, no Docker skills required

performance.title: High-Performance Computing Architecture
performance.description: A high-performance computing architecture built on Kubernetes, supporting large-scale distributed training and inference to fully leverage the computational potential of GPU clusters.

security.title: Enterprise-Grade Security
security.description: Provides comprehensive security mechanisms to protect your data and model assets, meeting enterprise-level security and compliance requirements.

integration.title: Open-Source Ecosystem Integration
integration.description: Deeply integrates with mainstream open-source components to provide a unified user experience and avoid technological fragmentation.

scalability.title: Flexible Scalability
scalability.description: A modular design that supports flexible expansion to adapt to the needs of different scales and scenarios.

CustomerScenarios.heading: Customer Scenarios
CustomerScenarios.subheading: Crater provides customized solutions for different types of organizations to meet various AI computing needs.

education.title: University Research
education.description: Replaces traditional Slurm clusters to manage private high-performance GPU nodes, offering a more user-friendly experience and higher resource utilization.

enterprise.title: Enterprise AI Teams
enterprise.description: Provides a unified development and production environment for enterprise AI teams, accelerating the entire model lifecycle from R&D to deployment.

cloudProvider.title: Cloud Service Providers
cloudProvider.description: Build public or private cloud AI platform services, offering customers elastic, secure, and efficient machine learning infrastructure.

GetStarted.heading: Get Started with Crater
GetStarted.subheading: Explore the resources below to quickly learn and deploy Crater, starting your journey into cloud-native AI.

docs.title: Quick Start Guide
docs.description: Detailed documentation and tutorials to help you get started with the Crater platform quickly.

github.title: GitHub Repository
github.description: Access our open-source code, contribute to the community, and join the discussion.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.description: Get technical support or learn about our enterprise deployment solutions.

0.question: What's the difference between Crater, OpenPAI, and Kubeflow?
0.answer: Crater deeply integrates scheduling, data, and environment configuration components to provide a more production-ready, out-of-the-box experience. Compared to OpenPAI and Kubeflow, Crater focuses more on user experience and resource utilization, lowering the entry barrier while maintaining high scalability.

1.question: Do you support on-premise deployment?
1.answer: Yes, Crater fully supports on-premise deployment on bare metal servers, VMware, OpenStack, and major cloud providers' Kubernetes services. We provide complete deployment documentation and technical support to ensure a smooth process.

2.question: How is data security ensured?
2.answer: Crater employs a multi-layered security mechanism to protect your data, including network isolation, access control, and data encryption. All data processing occurs within your private environment and is not uploaded to external servers, ensuring data security and privacy.

3.question: Which deep learning frameworks are supported?
3.answer: Crater supports mainstream deep learning frameworks, including but not limited to PyTorch, TensorFlow, JAX, and MXNet. We provide pre-configured environment templates for these frameworks, which you can select and customize as needed.

4.question: How is resource quota management handled?
4.answer: Crater offers fine-grained resource quota management, allowing administrators to set usage limits on GPU, CPU, memory, etc., for different user groups or projects, ensuring fair resource allocation and usage.

5.question: Do you offer commercial support?
5.answer: Yes, we offer enterprise-grade commercial support services, including technical consulting, custom development, training, and 24/7 incident response. Please contact us through official channels for more details.
